description:
Tierno`s Wartortle is the evolved form of Tierno`s Squirtle. It evolved sometime after battling Clembot at the Miare Gym and before meeting Ash Ketchum in the forest for a training double battle.
It was captured by Team Rocket but managed to escape and reunite with Tierno. During the training double battle against Pikachu and Ash`s Goodra, it got knocked out by Pikachu`s Thunderbolt.
name: Kameil (Tierno)
